verses.verse: וַיְהִי֩ <S%H1961><s%> become כְּכַלּ֨וֹת <S%H3615><s%> had made an end יִרְמְיָ֜הוּ <S%H3414><s%> And it came to pass [that] when Jeremiah לְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> of speaking אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> unto all the people אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all דִּבְרֵי֙ <S%H1697><s%> all the words יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> their God אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> whom שְׁלָח֛וֹ <S%H7971><s%> had sent יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> for which the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H430><s%> their God אֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> about אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <S%H1697><s%> him to them [even] all these words הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> these ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then spake עֲזַרְיָ֤ה <S%H5838><s%> Azariah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son הוֹשַֽׁעְיָה֙ <S%H1955><s%> of Hoshaiah וְיוֹחָנָ֣ן <S%H3110><s%> and Johanan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son קָרֵ֔חַ <S%H7143><s%> of Kareah וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <S%H376><s%> men הַזֵּדִ֑ים <S%H2086><s%> and all the proud אֹמְרִ֣ים <S%H559><s%> saying אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to יִרְמְיָ֗הוּ <S%H3414><s%> unto Jeremiah שֶׁ֚קֶר <S%H8267><s%> falsely אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> You מְדַבֵּ֔ר <S%H1696><s%> Thou speakest לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> has not שְׁלָחֲךָ֞ <S%H7971><s%> hath not sent יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H430><s%> our God לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> thee to say לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> are not תָבֹ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> Go מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> not into Egypt לָג֥וּר <S%H1481><s%> to sojourn שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> in it

כִּ֗י <S%H3588><s%> but בָּרוּךְ֙ <S%H1263><s%> But Baruch בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נֵ֣רִיָּ֔ה <S%H5374><s%> of Neriah מַסִּ֥ית <S%H5496><s%> setteth thee on אֹתְךָ֖ <S%H853><s%> בָּ֑נוּ לְמַעַן֩ <S%H4616><s%> against us for to תֵּ֨ת <S%H5414><s%> deliver אֹתָ֤נוּ <S%H853><s%> בְיַֽד־ <S%H3027><s%> us into the hand הַכַּשְׂדִּים֙ <S%H3778><s%> of the Chaldeans לְהָמִ֣ית <S%H4191><s%> that they might put us to death אֹתָ֔נוּ <S%H853><s%> וּלְהַגְל֥וֹת <S%H1540><s%> and carry us away captives אֹתָ֖נוּ <S%H853><s%> בָּבֶֽל׃ <S%H894><s%> into Babylon

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not שָׁמַע֩ <S%H8085><s%> obeyed יוֹחָנָ֨ן <S%H3110><s%> So Johanan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son קָרֵ֜חַ <S%H7143><s%> of Kareah וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all שָׂרֵ֧י <S%H8269><s%> and all the captains הַחֲיָלִ֛ים <S%H2428><s%> of the forces וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> and all the people בְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> not the voice יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לָשֶׁ֖בֶת <S%H3427><s%> to dwell בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah

וַיִּקַּ֞ח <S%H3947><s%> took יוֹחָנָ֤ן <S%H3110><s%> But Johanan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son קָרֵ֙חַ֙ <S%H7143><s%> of Kareah וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all שָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> and all the captains הַחֲיָלִ֔ים <S%H2428><s%> of the forces אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the entire שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <S%H7611><s%> all the remnant יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who שָׁ֗בוּ <S%H7725><s%> that were returned מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַגּוֹיִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> from all nations אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> to which נִדְּחוּ־ <S%H5080><s%> whither they had been driven שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> order לָג֖וּר <S%H1481><s%> to dwell בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah

אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> הַ֠גְּבָרִים <S%H1397><s%> [Even] men וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנָּשִׁ֣ים <S%H802><s%> and women וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַטַּף֮ <S%H2945><s%> and children וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנ֣וֹת <S%H1323><s%> daughters הַמֶּלֶךְ֒ <S%H4428><s%> and the king's וְאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every הַנֶּ֗פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> and every person אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> after הִנִּ֙יחַ֙ <S%H3240><s%> had left נְבוּזַרְאֲדָ֣ן <S%H5018><s%> that Nebuzaradan רַב־ <S%H7227><s%> the captain טַבָּחִ֔ים <S%H2876><s%> of the guard אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with גְּדַלְיָ֖הוּ <S%H1436><s%> with Gedaliah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֲחִיקָ֣ם <S%H296><s%> of Ahikam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שָׁפָ֑ן <S%H8227><s%> of Shaphan וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> יִרְמְיָ֣הוּ <S%H3414><s%> and Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֔יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּר֖וּךְ <S%H1263><s%> and Baruch בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נֵרִיָּֽהוּ׃ <S%H5374><s%> of Neriah

וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> So they came אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> into the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not שָׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> for they obeyed בְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> not the voice יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> thus came עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far תַּחְפַּנְחֵֽס׃ <S%H8471><s%> they [even] to Tahpanhes ס

וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> Then came the word יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <S%H3414><s%> unto Jeremiah בְּתַחְפַּנְחֵ֖ס <S%H8471><s%> in Tahpanhes לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

קַ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> Take בְּיָדְךָ֞ <S%H3027><s%> in thine hand אֲבָנִ֣ים <S%H68><s%> stones גְּדֹל֗וֹת <S%H1419><s%> great וּטְמַנְתָּ֤ם <S%H2934><s%> and hide בַּמֶּ֙לֶט֙ <S%H4423><s%> them in the clay בַּמַּלְבֵּ֔ן <S%H4404><s%> in the brickkiln אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּפֶ֥תַח <S%H6607><s%> which [is] at the entry בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> house פַּרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> of Pharaoh's בְּתַחְפַּנְחֵ֑ס <S%H8471><s%> in Tahpanhes לְעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight אֲנָשִׁ֥ים <S%H582><s%> of the men יְהוּדִֽים׃ <S%H3064><s%> of Judah

וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> And say אֲלֵיהֶ֡ם <S%H413><s%> to כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֩ <S%H559><s%> unto them Thus saith יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֜וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הִנְנִ֤י <S%H2005><s%> I am going שֹׁלֵ֙חַ֙ <S%H7971><s%> Behold I will send וְ֠לָקַחְתִּי <S%H3947><s%> and take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נְבוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֤ר <S%H5019><s%> Nebuchadrezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the king בָּבֶל֙ <S%H894><s%> of Babylon עַבְדִּ֔י <S%H5650><s%> my servant וְשַׂמְתִּ֣י <S%H7760><s%> and will set כִסְא֔וֹ <S%H3678><s%> his throne מִמַּ֛עַל <S%H4605><s%> upon לָאֲבָנִ֥ים <S%H68><s%> these stones הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> i טָמָ֑נְתִּי <S%H2934><s%> that I have hid וְנָטָ֥ה <S%H5186><s%> and he shall spread אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> [שַׁפְרוּרֹו כ] (שַׁפְרִירֹ֖ו <S%H8237><s%> royal pavilion ק) עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5921><s%> over

[וּבָאָה כ] (וּבָ֕א <S%H935><s%> abide ק) וְהִכָּ֖ה <S%H5221><s%> he shall smite אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> who לַמָּ֣וֶת <S%H4194><s%> [and deliver] such [as are] for death לַמָּ֗וֶת <S%H4194><s%> to death וַאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who לַשְּׁבִי֙ <S%H7628><s%> and such [as are] for captivity לַשֶּׁ֔בִי <S%H7628><s%> to captivity וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who לַחֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> and such [as are] for the sword לֶחָֽרֶב׃ <S%H2719><s%> to the sword

וְהִצַּ֣תִּי <S%H3341><s%> And I will kindle אֵ֗שׁ <S%H784><s%> a fire בְּבָתֵּי֙ <S%H1004><s%> in the houses אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> of the gods מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וּשְׂרָפָ֖ם <S%H8313><s%> and he shall burn וְשָׁבָ֑ם <S%H7617><s%> them and carry them away captives וְעָטָה֩ <S%H5844><s%> and he shall array אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with אֶ֨רֶץ <S%H776><s%> himself with the land מִצְרַ֜יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt כַּאֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after יַעְטֶ֤ה <S%H5844><s%> putteth on הָֽרֹעֶה֙ <S%H7462><s%> as a shepherd אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּגְד֔וֹ <S%H899><s%> his garment וְיָצָ֥א <S%H3318><s%> and he shall go forth מִשָּׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there בְּשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H7965><s%> from thence in peace

וְשִׁבַּ֗ר <S%H7665><s%> He shall break אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> מַצְּבוֹת֙ <S%H4676><s%> also the images בֵּ֣ית שֶׁ֔מֶשׁ <S%H1053><s%> of Bethshemesh אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> that [is] in the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּתֵּ֥י <S%H1004><s%> and the houses אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <S%H430><s%> of the gods מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> of the Egyptians יִשְׂרֹ֥ף <S%H8313><s%> shall he burn בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> with fire ס
